properties.name: gcloud.project.name
properties.description: The GCP project that we are hosting our service in

properties.name: gcloud.authentication.method
properties.description: The method of authentication with GCP

properties.name: gcloud.serviceaccount.credentials.file
properties.description: A file containing JSON-based service account credentials for GCP - usually set to null locally, unless you are using AuthenticationMethod.SERVICE_ACCOUNT

properties.name: gcloud.pubsub.url
properties.description: The URL to the Pub/Sub server, can be localhost when (integration) testing

properties.name: gcloud.pubsub.topic.name
properties.description: The name of the topic that we are publishing on

properties.name: gcloud.pubsub.subscription.name
properties.description: The name of the subscription that allows subscribing to the topic we are publishing on
